Contributing to pharmhand

Source: CONTRIBUTING.md

Getting started

  1. Fork and clone:
git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/pharmhand.git
  1. Install dependencies:
devtools::install_dev_deps()
  1. Create branch:
git checkout -b feature/your-feature

System dependencies

Install air:

# macOS
brew install posit-dev/tap/air

# Other platforms
# See https://posit-dev.github.io/air/

For R CMD check: - qpdf: brew install qpdf (macOS) or sudo apt-get install qpdf (Ubuntu) - Pandoc: Included with RStudio

Skip vignettes:

devtools::check(build_args = "--no-build-vignettes")

Code style

Use air for formatting (not styler): - Line width: 80 characters - Indent: tabs (width 2)

Format:

air format .

Check:

air format . --check

Lint:

lintr::lint_package()

Testing

Run tests:

devtools::test()

Add tests in tests/testthat/.

Documentation

Document with roxygen2:

devtools::document()

Include @examples where practical.

Before submitting

Run checks:

air format .
lintr::lint_package()
devtools::test()
devtools::check()

Update NEWS.md.

Pull requests

  1. Push branch to fork
  2. Open pull request
  3. Ensure CI passes
  4. Keep PRs focused

Issues

Report bugs at https://github.com/sims1253/pharmhand/issues.

Include minimal reproducible example.

On this page
